input.sentences: the parade went down the street .
the man drove his tractor in the parade .
the boy posed inside the machine .
the boy posed in the tractor .
the girls sat in the claw .
output.sentences: Today, there was a truck and tractor festival.
All the farmers brought in their tractors to show off to the town.
The construction workers also brought their vehicles and the townsfolk enjoyed seeing them.
Children hopped onto the tractors and pretended to drive.
They also sat in the claw of the construction vehicles.
